projects.title: Outrun
projects.description:
In a discussion with a prof I got interested if one could create a game that would run smoothly within the browser only using HTML Elements.

I tried to replicate Outrun from 1986 and really enjoy the result.

projects.title: HUEBOO VR
projects.description: HUEBOO is a VR-Game in which you are the bartender, tasked with serving drinks to your thirsty customers. Its a game about music, light and agility.

projects.title: Transmission
projects.description:
My first time at the Global Game Jam; 48h to code a game. I coded a custom engine and the game play, two friends did the art

In transmission you try to send a single through the solar system.

projects.title: The DI Museum
projects.description: Our class does not have any place to present our work. So I took in upon myself to create it, the project includes a custom CMS and the 3D landing page. I used it as a chance to experiment with a few new things.

projects.title: Code Wiki
projects.description:
I am not old but I have done many things. Most of which I forgot. That had to stop. I learned Node.js and Mongo and a lot more and started working on a solution.

CodeWiki is my place to store things and I welcome everyone to contribiute.

projects.title: Adminer Theme
projects.description:
Ahh Adminer. You are the best SQL manager out there. One file, so simple. Why on earth must you look like you're from 1970.

I took SCSS and the Material Design Guide and coded ahead. It's on GitHub now.

projects.title: MatTab
projects.description:
Chrome has this nice new tab page but I can do one better. I've never done a browser extension but this seemed like a good start.

Basically better Windows 8 tiles in Chrome.

projects.title: Tree Builder
projects.description:
In math we looked at L-Systems... and I was really bored. It was all way to simple and didn't even look interesting.

Therefore I opened CodePen and tried to get into more depth (haha, because 3D) with them, you can really fall in love with them.

projects.title: Minesweeper Solver
projects.description:
Minesweeper is one of those games that is actually fun to play but somehow isn't.

It just interested me if one could cheat it... :)
